attributes.action: officially recognise the Principality of Sealand
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Sealand deserves international recognition because when Paddy Roy Bates and his associates occupied Roughs Tower/HM Fort Roughs in 1967 it was located in international waters, outside the jurisdiction of the United Kingdom and all other sovereign states, thus constituting terra nullius which could be settled and claimed by a new State.

reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
